exploit.name: Syron
description: Syron was a Roblox executor owned by nam3xd and Soulzay / bennytrt.
It was released in 2022 and discontinued in 2023. It was an API-sploit, meaning it relied on public modules for injection and execution.

It featured a red-pinkish gradient user interface with a custom installer application, a theme system, the ability to use multiple APIs, and a custom API feature, which allowed you to use your own exploit module.
warnings: This exploit is discontinued! anyone advertising a new Syron version is scamming or ratting!
